A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Such a wasted opportunity. They got Luke completely wrong. They gave Leia superpowers in a scene they stole from Guardians of the Galaxy. The whole casino planet was straight out of the prequel trilogy. They killed a major character for no meaningful reason... I could go on. This is the worst Star Wars movie since Phantom Menace. I can't believe they gave this hack a new trilogy.
